title: Seems like a good rework
body:
https://i.imgur.com/vQtbbpM.png[]
https://i.imgur.com/aFpTymZ.png[]

But in all seriousness, I would like to say that the rework is good visually, gameplay and flow wise. Just the numbers currently are a bit over the head, as specially his Q base damage, or the Shield that his W gives..

EDIT: I only just noticed his banrate, it explains a lot...

https://i.imgur.com/yQ1FN7L.png[]

> [{quoted}](name=Darkin Hybrid,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=2sHGBWI3,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-06-20T13:17:09.470+0000)
>
> So you're going to ignore the stats too?

those stats include games from before the hotfix, so you need to wait until next patch to see his actual wr, or go to lolaylitcs and you will see his win rate(by day) is dropping steadily each day in every elo.

i miss old morde i didn't know riot would turn him into this abomination i haven't touched him yet give reasonable damage and tankiness pls after getting two new hard cc abilities you think he would lose stats in compensation not gain them lol
To be fair, no one on the enemy team was even close to as useless as your graves and Vlad.
